member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.PdfViewer.StreamDocumentSource.Stream
member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate responsible for returning a Stream for the RadFixedDocument. The stream is closed automatically.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.PdfViewer.StreamDocumentSource.Import(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a RadFixedDocument to be used in the RadPdfViewer. The stream is not closed automatically.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.PdfViewer.StreamDocumentSource.ImportAsync(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a RadFixedDocument asynchronously to be used in the RadPdfViewer. The stream is not closed automatically.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.PdfViewer.PdfViewportUtils
member.summary: This class exists because the meaning of Viewport in v1 and v2 of the PdfViewer is different. In v1 the Viewport's scroll is dependent on the zoom, and its size is the same as the size of the presenter. Also in v1 a root-size-helper is used which distorts the page size.
